name: Tempo Typen
description:
Tempo Typen is an educational program to learn ten finger blind typing. The course consists of seven lessons.

The lessons are as follows:
  • Lesson 1: The middle row of the keyboard
  • Lesson 2: The top row keys
  • Lesson 3: The bottom row keys
  • Lesson 4: Numbers
  • Lesson 5: Words
  • Lesson 6: Sentences
  • Lesson 7: Texts
In the game, you can put the course into practice by typing the words you see on the screen as quickly as possible before it is destroyed by the laser beam. If they are hit by the laser beam, you lose energy until everything runs out and then you have to start all over again. There are nine levels.

The MSX version of this game has eight levels.

shot.caption: Main Menu. Can you see the typo? (Dutch)
In the demonstration we get an explanation on the positioning of our fingers. (Dutch)
Instructions. (Dutch)
Cursus Overzicht. The submenu that allows us to choose from different lessons. (Dutch)

Cursus: Lesson Two; Practising the top row of the keyboard. (Dutch)
Cursus: Lesson Three; Practising the bottom row of the keyboard. (Dutch)
Cursus: Lesson Four; Practising the numbers of the keyboard. (Dutch)
Cursus: Lesson Five; Practising the words. (Dutch)
Cursus: Lesson Six; Practising sentences. (Dutch)
Cursus: Lesson Seven; Type in texts from books, etc. to further improve your skills and speed. (Dutch)
Cursus: Lesson Seven; By pressing F7 we interrupt the text and we get our typing speed in keystrokes per minute. (Dutch)

Tempo Typen: At each level the laser beam will come closer and closer and you will have to type much faster. (Dutch)
